summary: The spiteful ghost of Sadako, a murdered woman whose body was thrown down a well, reaches the Internet searching for a host in order to live once again.
cast: Satomi Ishihara|Kôji Seto|Ryôsei Tayama|Tsutomu Takahashi|Hikari Takara|Yûsuke Yamamoto|Shôta Sometani|Ai Hashimoto|Risako Itô|Shunsuke Itô|Yôko Kita|Yûna Taira
keywords: entering tv screen|screaming woman|screaming in horror|supernatural power|red eyes
title: Sadako 3D
